thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Maria Roc
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Maria Roc

author: Maria Roc
title: Maria Roc
text: Value for money. I always compare one item in different discount sites, and Banggood always turns out to have the cheapest prices on the same item. Customer support also answers promptly when there is a problem (eg., 1 package out of 20 not arriving --- I had been refunded promptly as well). There is also an option for free shipping (at the risk of not being trackable) and direct charge to my debit card (as I hate Paypal's fees).
